short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple countdown timer extension for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Countdown Timer" is a Chrome extension designed to help users keep track of important tasks with ease. Featuring both countdown and alarm functionalities, this extension provides a convenient way to set timers or alarms directly from your browser. Even if Chrome or the extension is closed, the background service continues to keep track of the countdown, ensuring you never miss an important reminder. The simple interface makes it accessible for quick adjustments to alarms or timers, perfect for anyone seeking a reliable, no-fuss time management tool.
